# Emanate Documentation

> The AI Revenue Engine for Industrial Materials

Emanate provides autonomous AI agents that handle revenue-generating operations for industrial materials companies. This documentation covers setup, configuration, and integration of voice agents, chat agents, lead management, and campaign orchestration.

## Quick Links

- Introduction: /introduction
- Quickstart Guide: /getting-started/quickstart
- API Reference: /api-reference/overview

## Core Concepts

### Agents
AI-powered voice and chat agents that handle customer interactions autonomously.
- Voice Agents: Phone-based AI agents for inbound/outbound calls
- Chat Agents: Website embeddable chat widgets
- Workflow Squads: Multi-agent orchestration for complex workflows

### Leads
Automated lead capture, enrichment, and CRM synchronization.
- Lead Capture: Extract contact info from agent conversations
- Lead Enrichment: Apollo.io integration for company/contact data
- ICP Scoring: AI-powered ideal customer profile matching
- CRM Sync: HubSpot/Salesforce integration via Merge

### Campaigns
Outbound voice campaign management with real-time monitoring.
- Voice Campaigns: Automated outbound calling
- Monitoring: Real-time call tracking and alerts

### Analytics
Comprehensive metrics and conversation insights.
- Call Logs: Voice call history and transcripts
- Chat Logs: Chat session history
- Evaluations: Test scenarios for agent quality assurance
- Insights: AI-generated performance analysis

## Tech Stack

- Framework: Next.js (App Router)
- Voice AI: VAPI
- Database: Supabase (PostgreSQL)
- Auth: PropelAuth
- Styling: Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui

## File Structure

```
docs/
├── introduction.mdx
├── getting-started/
│   ├── welcome.mdx
│   ├── quickstart.mdx
│   ├── onboarding.mdx

├── agents/

│   ├── voice-agents.mdx
│   ├── chat-agents.mdx
│   ├── workflow-squads.mdx
│   ├── knowledge-base.mdx
│   ├── custom-actions.mdx
│   └── testing.mdx
├── campaigns/
│   ├── overview.mdx
│   ├── voice-campaigns.mdx
│   └── monitoring.mdx
├── leads/
│   ├── overview.mdx
│   ├── capture.mdx
│   ├── enrichment.mdx
│   ├── icp-scoring.mdx
│   └── crm-sync.mdx
├── analytics/
│   ├── overview.mdx
│   ├── call-logs.mdx
│   ├── chat-logs.mdx
│   ├── evaluations.mdx
│   └── insights.mdx
├── integrations/
│   ├── overview.mdx
│   ├── crm.mdx
│   ├── email.mdx
│   └── erp.mdx
├── tutorials/

│   ├── lead-qualification.mdx
│   └── outbound-campaign.mdx
├── api-reference/
│   ├── overview.mdx
│   └── webhooks.mdx
└── about/
    ├── overview.mdx
    ├── release-notes.mdx
    └── roadmap.mdx
```
